data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Joe had been diagnosed with pneumonia, and his physician recommended rest and medication. Along ____ this ____ of ____, ____ also ____ that Joe keep ____ home ____, ____ that ____ lungs ____ recuperate ____ quickly. Joe swiftly purchased a humidifier, and also took long steamy showers.
data.partBlankContent: Joe had been diagnosed with pneumonia, and his physician recommended rest and medication. Along wi__ this cou___ of trea_____, h_ also sugg_____ that Joe keep h__ home humid_____, s_ that h__ lungs co___ recuperate mo__ quickly. Joe swiftly purchased a humidifier, and also took long steamy showers.
data.answer: 乔被诊断出患有肺炎，他的医生建议他休息并服药。在进行治疗的同时，他还建议乔保留家里的加湿器，这样他的肺就可以更快地恢复。乔很快买了一个加湿器，也洗了很长时间的蒸汽淋浴。
